htaccess 404 cPanel Server

by Lucas Gatsas on June 1, 2015
Scroll Down

Modify .htaccess

"Separat Things on cPanel"

To Run a .htaccess File on your cPanel Server. ErrorDocument 404 /404.html Create One, Save it as .htaccess and create a 404.html or 505.html. Notice: Do you don’t will see this File on your Machine or Computer. Becuase it’s a invisible and hidden File.
